研究揭示了基于关键线粒体基因的新型膀胱癌诊断模型使用机器学习 (ML) 的新型诊断模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Study-unveils-novel-bladder-cancer-diagnostic-model-based-on-key-mitochondrial-genes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Study-unveils-novel-bladder-cancer-diagnostic-model-based-on-key-mitochondrial-genes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6e3525f-2039-4412-8111-e944f8f6f66d Wed, 24 Apr 2024 08:13:00 -0400 Study unveils novel bladder cancer diagnostic model based on key mitochondrial genes
麻醉咪达唑仑可提高心脏骤停后的生存率如果患者在心脏骤停后成功复苏并且循环恢复，那么他们还没有脱离困境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Anesthetic-midazolam-boosts-survival-after-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Anesthetic-midazolam-boosts-survival-after-cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=438bf2c0-1401-4305-ae9e-d5264b9f​​c201 Wed, 24 Apr 2024 08:07:23 -0400 Anesthetic midazolam boosts survival after cardiac arrest
中年黑人女性心血管健康状况较好，认知能力下降较少根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的一项新研究，在中年黑人女性中，更好的心脏健康与心理处理速度和认知能力下降较少有关，但在中年白人女性中则不然。 -美国心脏协会杂志的评论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Better-cardioangio-health-among-middle-ages-Black-women-linked-to-less-decline-in-cognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Better-cardioangio-health-among-middle-ages-Black-women-linked-to-less-decline-in-cognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9446db3a-bbca-473d-9aa9-95079cfe00b0 Wed, 24 Apr 2024 08:02:28 -0400 Better cardiovascular health among middle-aged Black women linked to less decline in cognition
调查显示，大多数父母都经历过孤立、孤独和倦怠俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心进行的一项新的全国调查发现，绝大多数父母因养育子女的要求而感到孤立、孤独和倦怠，许多人感到在履行这一角色时缺乏支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Majority-of-parents-experience-isolation-loneiness-and-burnout-survey-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Majority-of-parents-experience-isolation-loneiness-and-burnout-survey-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93884401-e6ca-4b1f-9130-f15bc7ffcd1b Wed, 24 Apr 2024 07:58:20 -0400 Majority of parents experience isolation, loneliness and burnout, survey reveals
